Posts.Content: thank u for ur reply i would like to add that she has had this dimple for the last 3-4 years.. do all dimples in breast mean that there is a cancer??if not wat r the other reasons the dimple could be a result of?? plz do clear this out for me
Posts.Title: could this be a sign of breast cancer?

Posts.Content: hello there i have an aunt who since the past year or two has a small dimple in one of her breasts(the right one)..its towards the lower part of the breast.. she got her x-ray and mammography done in feb2005 and it was found that she has small cysts in both her breast but they r of a negliable size (less then a cm) ..the small cyst in the right breast is not near the dimple..i would like to know that why does she has a dimple??she has no regular pains in her breasts whatsoever.. is it a sign of concern or could it be that its because of old age(she is 54 yrs old)..plz do let me know..thank u in advance
Posts.Title: could this be a sign of breast cancer?
